projects.title: Meteor Tracker
projects.text: This is code for a system of networked Raspberry Pis that use cameras to track and triangulate meteor trajectories as they hit the atmosphere.

projects.title: pyDataLearn
projects.text: This is a collection of Machine Learning algorithms for analyzing patterns in web based data.  It is intended to be easy for a user to read and modify.

projects.title: FUEGO
projects.text: I'm currently assisting in the design of machine learning algorithms for the FUEGO project that will be an early warning system for forest fires.

projects.title: Autonomous Robot Arm
projects.text: This is a robot arm that uses a ceiling mounted camera to detect and pick up different obects.  It is able to determine the type of object and the optimal orientation to pick it up.

projects.title: Quadruped
projects.text: This ROS based quadruped is capable of gait locomotion, localization using monocular egomotion, and sparse monocular SLAM.

projects.title: Nuclear Fusor
projects.text: Here is a fusion capable reactor I built to learn more about plasmas and nuclear fusion.

projects.title: Electrospinner
projects.text: This is a device known as an electrospinner that can be used to create artificial extracellular matrices (ECM) for growing cells.  I created this as an independent project after hearing about the high prices for ECM growth dishes.

projects.title: This Website!
projects.text: This is a fully responsive website I built using Bootstrap, Angularjs, and nodejs.  I even have a custom blog built using packages like handlebars.
